mainText:
Steve I know you didn't know my uncle, but you were at the helm when he started working for you guys, and that's enabled him to share the joy of your technology and innovation from his first hand experience working at such a terrific company.  Thanks a lot for giving your work to the people, and bringing such fresh ideas to all your projects.  We will all miss you. Rest in Peace.

Viva la Apple!
author: Trey
